oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: All things were once people. They became beasts of prey when the Anteater and the Lynx cursed each other. 1) See also The Anteater's laws (|a!kunta's version) and The Anteater, Springbok and Lynx (||kabbo's version 1) and The Anteater's laws (||kabbo's version 2), 2) This story is found in Book VIII-18.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Beasts of prey were once people
